title: Limited Edition Ibis Exie 40th Anniversary Bikes are built to fly, as light as 22lbs
content:
The 40th Anniversary Ibis Exie is ready to fly. Right off the shelves, that is. Limited to just 40 bikes for the riding public, this is a very rare bird that won’t be around for long. OK, technically, there will be 50 Limited Edition bikes out there, but 10 of those have been reserved for […]

The post Limited Edition Ibis Exie 40th Anniversary Bikes are built to fly, as light as 22lbs appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
